title: pivot
desc: group by a given column in an axis and aggregate the value of another column (like SQL)

input.name: data
input.description: Column(s) to use for populating new frame’s values.

params.name: index
params.description: Name of columns which value to be used to make new frame’s index

params.name: columns
params.description: Name of columns which value to be used to make new frame’s columns.

params.name: aggregate
params.description: Map key is groupKey, map value is aggregate function. Currently support Sum, Count, Mean, Min, Max
